text_block_list.text: The day after I watched the race with Tazuna—

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Once again… Welcome, Trainer-san! This is the Japan Horsegirl Training Center Academy.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: This is Japan's premier horsegirl training organization, where girls who dream of entering the world of racing gather!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Hey, Principal Akikawa…! Don't scare us like that!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: My apologies! I was distracted by the sight of a promising trainer!!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Once again, I am the principal of this school, Akikawa! It is nice to meet you, New Trainer-kun!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: First off… Come on! Tell me more about yourself!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Welcome! Trainer <username>, you're now a member of Tracen Academy!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Your expectations!! Please use your skills to make your horsegirls' dreams come true, together!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: What the horsegirls at this academy aspire to is… their greatest stage as runners; the Twinkle Series.

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: It's your job as trainer to help your horsegirl. To teach her! To guide her! To support her!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: And more! Endeavor to live up to that trainer badge on your chest!!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Well then, without further ado… let's get to training, Trainer <username>!
